main event: A bright, white object was observed in the sky over Little Rock, Arkansas on May 11, 1967. The object changed color from blue to orange and appeared to have two more objects close to it.
interesting points: The object was as bright as a bright light and made no sound.
The object changed color from blue to orange according to the observer.
There were two more objects close to the main object.
The sighting lasted for about 3 hours.
The object appeared to hover and make little movement.
sighted object: A bright, white object that changed color from blue to orange
